website_summaries.verdict: A truly natural option made with  purified water.
pros: These wipes are good for babies who do not do well with other wipes
Stay amazingly moist with just water
Uses grapefruit seed extract as a skin conditioner
cons: Wipes are more expensive than other brands

customer_reviews.title: CONTAINS CHEMICALS/ DONT GET DUPED
customer_reviews.text: CONTAINS CHEMICALS! Don't get super... these are not the same wipes, they are fakes all around! These wipes contain chloride and are not chemical free, they are missing all the seals and the ingredients list isn't the same. Please review my pictures before you get scammed too! (Doesn't even deserve a 1 star rating but I had to put something to submit this.)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole VinCurek

customer_reviews.title: They've changed :(
customer_reviews.text: I've raved about these wipes to everyone! They were thick, moist, sturdy. My recent shipment was smaller, thinner wipes and the packaging tears really easily causing the wipes to dry out. Hope they revert to the original wipes. The company said they'd changed packaging due to complaints about it being bulky . . .I've never heard anyone complain about them being bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yep, they're moldy.
customer_reviews.text: Yep, the reviewers who said these are crap are totally right. I figured that there must have been some user error involved, but I've stored the wipes in a dark area at a constant 66 degrees. So far, 2 of the 4 packages have been mold filled. Do not purchase. The photo doesn't show well, but it's all mold. Gross!
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes but need a plastic flip top
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are awesome. Soft, stretchy, and Natural! I always wondered why the need for all the extra chemicals and garbage in baby wipes, and finally companies are thinking with their heads. I’m only giving it 4 stars however because these really need a flip top instead of the sticker lid. The wipes stay very wet for a long time, another huge plus that they don’t dry out. But sometimes the sticker lid doesn’t seal very well and water can leak out. Flip tops are also just easier to deal with. Please make these with flip top without raising the price! I’m now trying pampers pure only because of their lid.
customer_reviews.author: avjv0405

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are smaller than other brands and tend to stick to the skin instead of glide. Not heavily scented. The worst part is that one wipe doesn’t pull out the next. Every new wipe requires you to pinch around to find the edge, often resulting in a whole bunch coming out at once. Overall, I wouldn’t recommend them. But they get the job done so I will use them up.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes, mildly annoying to pull out
customer_reviews.text: I'll start off by saying we love these wipes, the wipes themselves have no scent, they work well, and they're soft without any complaints from our twins and don't cause rashes. That said, the way they're packaged and folded makes them mildly annoying to pull out, especially as you get down to the last 4-5 wipes. It's most noticable when you're trying to change your little one and he pees on himself because you were struggling to get the wipes out for an extra 20-30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: sven

customer_reviews.title: These are not fake water wipes
customer_reviews.text: As some have stated the ingredients have chemicals in it. That is true. However it has always been there but now they are stating it on the package. The fruit extract they are using has it. I checked their website. They are being more upfront about what's in their wipes so they arent fake water wipes.. they are just in a new package that states exactly what's in it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Q

customer_reviews.title: Not a smooth wipe.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these. We use wet wipes regularly in the bathroom and have tried several brands. What we want: chemical free, good size, resealable package, soft texture, no scent, durable. These wipes hit most of those points, but are lacking something in the texture. Instead of wiping smoothly, they sort of stick or catch. Seems the material they are made of is the problem. Previous brands all felt smooth and wiped smooth. These do not. I won’t order again. Going back to the best so far, Kyndful.
customer_reviews.author: jislove

customer_reviews.title: THESE SUCK!!! In contention for worst wipes on the market
customer_reviews.text: These wipes stick to everything and fail to wipe, the first thing they come in contact with (usually your hand) is what it becomes stuck on and makes it impossible to wipe my child's butt. You're better off going with the Pampers wipes. This is OVERPRICED and didn't even do the job. Impossible to wipe with one hand, you need to unfold each wipe using 2 hands so if you're ever in a pinch (which is common for a parent) you will not be able to use these wipes....might as well throw your child in the ocean to wash them off (Don't actually do this).
customer_reviews.author: PS HIGGS

customer_reviews.title: The BEST wipes
customer_reviews.text: We are a "semi-crunchy" family, so we try to not use chemicals, especially on our skin. My babies' skins are very sensitive. I love that these wipes do not have any additives, and do not affect their skin. Overall, these are by far my favorite wipes. I also like that you can buy in bulk so they are always on-hand. The only frustrating part is when you try to pull just one, sometimes they do not come out smoothly and you get multiple, but the fact that they are healthy and clean for my babes makes it not a deal-breaker for us.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: These are not real water wipes!!! They hurt my baby’s sensitive skin within the first day of use. I had one rub against my elbow and it got soooo itchy. The first pack was fine, but the second one I opened caused severe redness during use! I can’t believe this is what’s being sold to parents trying to care for their baby’s super sensitive skin. I now have 11 packs I can’t even use. It’s such a waste of money, but thank you I guess because now I’ve washed them and made my own solution.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Great, but one minor flaw.
customer_reviews.text: The one thing that I do not like about these wipes is that they aren’t folded inside one another. So when you pull up a wipe, the next one doesn’t come up. And they aren’t easy to fold where you pull on the next one. Maybe it doesn’t matter to some people, but when you have a real mess and just need to grab a wipe, but you can’t, it’s pretty annoying. You can pull it up still all folded, but obviously you want to unfold it to use the whole wipe, and who wants to have to do that in the middle of a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Reay

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed water wipes from last shipment
customer_reviews.text: We have used water wipes for almost four years now and have enjoyed it so far. However, with this last shipment we noticed the quality of the wipes had gone down. They used to be thick and very moist. With the last shipment the wipes are thinner and seem drier. The design of the wipes seem to have changed from smooth to bumpy type. The plastic opening of each package easily rips and the sticky part to close doesn’t stay close after 2-3 openings. We never mind about the high price compared to other wipes because of quality. But it seems the quality has suffered recently.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Only wipes we use!
customer_reviews.text: My little one is 14 months old and these are the only wipes out of several brands and types I've tried that doesn't bother her. Other wipes make her break out worse or hurt her when she does have a rash. No issues with these wipes. Literally my only complaint is I wish they came out of the package a little easier but her not being in pain is worth the extra effort.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Caruso

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST WIPES
customer_reviews.text: We tried a few different wipes for our newborn, but a friend recommended these after he had a diaper rash and we've never looked back. They don't dry out or have a strong smell. We still use them now that he is 3. Because they are so pure, can also be used on hands and face. I use them to remove makeup in a pinch as well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, very moist, no irritation, no chemicals, thick cloth wipes, scent free love them!
customer_reviews.text: Not much of a scent it's scent free which is fine it's cloth like but not cheap quality cleans very well no irritation as compared to leading wipes like Huggies or Pampers due to it having no chemicals, wipes weren't dry like at all they were very noisy and helpful and getting the job done! My kids poops alot and they cleaned the mess well! No complaints and it's my first purchase and first time hearing about these im glad I did buy
customer_reviews.author: Lateefa Jackson

customer_reviews.title: BEST wipes I've EVER used!
customer_reviews.text: These come off as a little steep, but amidst the Covid-19 fiasco, I gave in and purchased what i.could since the local stores were getting wiped out, along with most of Amazon. I wanted to make sure we had what we needed for my toddler. I bit the bullet and purchased these wipes and I SWEAR to you, these are by far the BEST wipes I've EVER came across! They stay very moist, are extremely soft and this box actually lasted for quite longer than I expected. If your child has allergies of any kind or you don't like the idea of chemicals, THESE are your wipes!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: These should be the best selling wipes on the market
customer_reviews.text: We bought these because everyone had bought up the pampers sensitive (online and in stores) Now I won’t switch back. We use A LOT less of these to clean and our son doesn’t fight us now on changing his diaper. It’s so much cheaper in the long run. The plastic flap stays closed and the moisture remains. I think even the sensitive wipes bothered my son and these don’t. They are very wet unlike name brands. I just wish local stores sold them. These are now a go-to when I take diapers/wipes to a baby shower
customer_reviews.author: Jessica and Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: From the face to the bum, no scent or sting!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as emergency toilet paper since I ran out a week ago and have only been able to find baby wipe online, none at the stores. I’d been using paper towels but that hurts! Trust me, wet the paper towels and add some glycerin if you get that desperate! Anyway, I rather like these wipes! No scent, thin enough to be able to flush and since I live in Texas and sweat terribly if it’s over 80*, I can use these wipes on my face since it’s just water! I may continue to buy these as face wipes!
customer_reviews.author: MZ Jackson

customer_reviews.title: NOT UNSCENTED
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT unscented. I’ve been using Water Wipes exclusively for over 2 years as they are the ONLY wipes that don’t irritate my son. When I was down to a few packs I ordered another case (as normal). Tonight I needed to refill our wipes dispenser & opened the package. I immediately could smell a chemical scent. I opened our travel package of the old wipes to compare & I was right. Strong chemical scent. I’ve been ordering these from amazon for years & now I’m not sure I’ll continue to. I have an entire case of wipes I can’t use for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn R

customer_reviews.title: Using this since my Baby's birth with no issue till date
customer_reviews.text: We parents get worried when it comes to baby's health and selecting product for them. We get extra cautious when it comes to baby's hygiene. Have been using Water wipes for probably more than 1 year now for my baby. Must accept that this is so far remains the best baby wipes used so far. We tried almost 4-5 different baby wipes both of higher price and lower one compared to WaterWipes. Best part is it's free from any chemical( used in other to add scent). I am really happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mohinish Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Very moist wipes, would be better with a texture
customer_reviews.text: I like how wet these wipes are and that they have as few ingredients as possible! I do wish they had some kind of texture to them to help clean off baby’s bottom a little quicker. They’re fully smooth and sometimes it requires harder rubbing to get the mess off. The wipes are sometimes a bit challenging to get out one at a time, especially as you near the bottom of the package. I usually try to solve this by taking out a couple of wipes before starting the diaper change.
customer_reviews.author: QuietOwl

customer_reviews.title: looks like they recently changed the package looks and also some ...
customer_reviews.text: we've been using this brand of wipe for as long as the toddler is born, and now with the 2nd baby too. no issues whatsoever. however, looks like they recently changed the package looks and also some details in the small prints, one of them includes some ingredients like chloride that wasn't mentioned earlier. this is now look like the "fake" version described by the other reviewer. i doubt it's "fake" though, I think it's still the "real" product but they probably added a tiny bit of other ingredient to prevent it from molding.
customer_reviews.author: oohay

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy on Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: We have used these wipes on and off for the past 3 years. I appreciate there are essentially no additional ingredients aside from water. Both of our kiddos have sensitive skin and we have never had any overt skin irritation from using these wipes. The challenge is that the wipes are somewhat flimsy and often require me to use more than 2 or 3 wipes to fully clean up a bigger mess. I do wish they were more durable and more competitive in pricing as we go through the package rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: We stopped using disposable wipes for years...
customer_reviews.text: We had stopped using disposable wipes for years after terrible chemical burns from the preservatives in conventional wipes. We were making our own wipes at home, but it's nice to have a disposable option while on the go and out of town. We started using water wipes almost 4 years ago and buy them for everyone having a baby. No issues with our very sensitive skin and they are effective, especially with newborn poo that tends to be difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Gammo

customer_reviews.title: Moldy!! Fungus beware!
customer_reviews.text: I'm horrified!! My daughter has had a terrible diaper rash for months! After going to multiple doctor appointments with out any success of it clearing we went to a dermatologist to find out it was a bad fungus! I have been using this large package of water wipes I purchased last year and I opened them up to put into a new wipe dispenser to find that the bottom of the wipes are covered in green mold! Could this have been where this fungus came from?
customer_reviews.author: Jay9BF

customer_reviews.title: A Plus/Minus product
customer_reviews.text: It’s great to find a wipe that is free of all of the obnoxious ingredients (perfumes and chemicals), but it’s pluses are, unfortunately, offset by the fact that this wipe is not flushable and will take some time to break down in a landfill; this fact alone will prevent me from buying Water Wipes regularly; please consider using your great moistening formula on a paper based wipe that easily biodegrades and is practical for the earth.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Woman

customer_reviews.title: There the best wipes I have found.
customer_reviews.text: Best wipes on the market. Smell them they don’t smell like chemicals. I love feedback so please let me know if this review was Helpful or not helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mathers

customer_reviews.title: More WATER than wipe
customer_reviews.text: Yes, they're soft. Virtually anything would be if they're soaking wet like these are. Whatever you do, go easy on the squeezy or you might have a puddle to contend with. Scent? WHAT scent? There might be something there, but hopefully that's the point because I was hoping for a little more. The soggy dampness is a bit much. and NEVER FLUSH "FLUSHABLE WIPES"! They're should go in the TRASH once they've been used. Despite claims, every plumber I've talked to says "DO NOT FLUSH!" Everyone has said 'these can sometimes clog drains as time goes by.' Check with your plumber. They might have a different opinion.
customer_reviews.author: JamesLeeMSD

customer_reviews.title: love love love
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these wipes, this was the first product recommended to me as mom to be, my friends said not to waste money on other less expensive baby wipes because allot of them have alcohol, certain scent & other artificial stuff, so I took their advice and did not experiment with wipes & just went and got these. They are indeed all water based, they don't smell or irritate. Just reordered another set due to discounted price. This is A MUST HAVE wipes for newborns.
customer_reviews.author: Vladlena Malikova

customer_reviews.title: Annoying to use
customer_reviews.text: The wipes are moist and gentle on babys skin but I absolutely hate how you can only pull one out at a time and have to unfold it before use. It's really annoying when you have a newborn or a blowout because you have to guess how many wipes you need and prep them by laying them out so you can change a diaper and clean your baby's bum. It's even harder with a baby boy who streams pee suddenly and your trying to grab wipes and unfold them while trying to stop a pee stream or clean the mess quickly. If I buy again it would purely be for cleaning hands after meals and not for diaper changes.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: So my wife accidentally bought these wipes and for the price I really don’t like them for two Main reasons. 1) whenever you pull out of wipe it doesn’t catch the next one well and you have to dig to get the next one. 2) they’re way more expensive than Amazon brand water wipes
customer_reviews.author: Michael Giordano

customer_reviews.title: It has gotten a lot better after quite a few changes we’ve made and one ...
customer_reviews.text: My son had severe eczema. It has gotten a lot better after quite a few changes we’ve made and one of them is this product. I can’t rave enough about the quality of these wipes. Everything in them is all natural. The wipes themselves are nice. A bit on thinner side but that doesn’t bother me. The only change I wish I could make was that they had a thick plastic snap close on top. The sticky thin plastic film thends to lose its stick after multiple uses. That being said though the wipes never seem to dry out even if it’s lightly closed.
customer_reviews.author: Msanchez4

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and consistent product satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: My family is a consistent consumer of water wipes and I am extremely satisfied. My toddler has had severe allergies since birth and water wipes has been a faithful companion through it all. As well, I suffer from chemical allergies myself and I have found water wipes gentle and helpful for me to use too. I have bought tons of water wipes packages and have only found one damaged single pack. I have found the products consistent in satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more rashes!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since we switched to Water Wipes. our baby has rarely gotten any diaper rashes. When we used Huggies sensitive wipes, it would irritate the skin and it only got worse as time went on. We avoided rashes by using these wipes and drying the skin completely before putting the diaper on. We never even need diaper cream/paste. So glad we realized all the extra chemical ingredients in different baby wipes cause irritation - none of that is in Water Wipes! It only has water and a tiny amount of fruit extract. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Laney

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I have used all sorts of non chemical wipes and found these to be far superior than everything else. The paper doesn't start falling apart when you use it so it wipes really clean. The texture and feel is soft, moistness is perfect, seal on the pack stays put until i'm finished with the pack, and it's easy to open one handed when you have a squirmy poopy baby. My only concern is that they may not be as biodegradable as other wipes (the wipes remind me a dryer sheets when dry). I buy these by the case. Love that they have no chemicals or smell.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Best for Baby's Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about WaterWipes - and this is why I took off one star - is how difficult it can be sometimes to pull one wipe from the rest. When your hands are full with a squirmy baby or toddler on the changing table, just finding the edge to pull some wipes out of the bag/box can be super frustrating (the wipes aren't uniformly packed like they are with, say, Pampers). HOWEVER, my oldest son has extremely sensitive skin, and WaterWipes work extremely well for him without aggrivating his skin or burning with any chemicals like other brands did, and for that reason alone I'll never go to a different wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Poor dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Dispensing and unfolding each wipe is a waste of consumers time. POOR DISPENSER! Wipes do not come out of packing individually! Hard to grab one wipe when needed and ten come out due to clumping. Pampers and Huggies fold their wipes better so the next one is ready to be grabbed for a fast diaper change. If you’re in a hurry these are NOT for you.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Closest alternative to washing with water at every diaper change
customer_reviews.text: My son developed a sensitivity to most wipes, I guess the chemicals probably build up on the skin, and only washing his butt with water helped his skin stay clean instead of getting redder and redder so I switched to water wipes and now he doesn't get rashes as easily. Yea sometimes it's hard to get only 1 wipe out, so what? At least that little bit of inconvenience allows my baby the comfort of not hurting. He was cry harder if he has a rash and I wipe him with huggies or some other wipes, but not with these. I think the other wipes burn on irritated skin.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Way too thin!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these when I couldn’t get the Pure wipes we usually get. Not even close to being as good as them. They are much thinner and you will go through more to clean the kids. Unfortunately the Aqua Pure wipes were not available during the Covid crisis and these were the most highly rated ones I found. Not sure why they were but IMO not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dynamite

customer_reviews.title: Love but one complaint...
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, but have one complaint. These wipes are in the package individually and not connected, aka if you put them into a wipes container then you constantly have to dig for the next wipe (the next wipe isn’t connected). We do use wipe warmers and we have to open the entire thing to get the next wipe. I wish they were all connected to make things more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: HMoni

customer_reviews.title: Better for adults, not babies
customer_reviews.text: Bought these wipes out of desperation (nothing else was available) and I would only use them as a last resort for my baby. They do not provide a smooth wipe on his bottom, I feel like it drags and doesn't really wipe well. I have used it myself and plan to take it when we go camping or road trips, as I think it works well for adults. It wouldn't be bad for wiping hands for children too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Haddad

customer_reviews.title: TOO WET
customer_reviews.text: I like these wipes, overall. BUT I found them to be TOO WET. I felt like I needed to dry baby's bottom each time I used it! I used one of the other major brands with my first kids and gave these a try with #3, but I'm going back to the others. There is little to no scent, which is great if that's what you're looking for. I just prefer a wipe that actually grabs the poop and cleans, as opposed to just wetting the bottom significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST WIPES EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I love how sensitive it is on a baby's skin. Moreover, I also found that it takes fewer water-wipes to clean than the cheaper wipes found in the stores. So if you are looking for value for money, in the long run, I believe, you're saving money by giving your child the best. Definitely no chemicals! Only water wipes that clean really well. I also noticed that these can be used on the hands and face compared to the other scented wipes that cause redness to the skin. I'd advise any parents to stay away from anything scented and invest in these incredible wipes for the sake of your children's tender skin.
customer_reviews.author: RC Reviews

customer_reviews.title: My favorite wipes
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many baby wipes and these are still my favorite! They are always wet which makes it easier to wipe off dirt, food, poop, or anything. Doesn’t hurt or irritate the skin from rubbing too hard because they are soft and wet all the time. Just wish there was a snap closure to the container so water didn’t leak out the top. I open the bags and put into plastic containers
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Amodio

customer_reviews.title: Too watery to my liking
customer_reviews.text: No sent seem soft enough but just so watery! Did not like that part well... like i put some in diaper bag and its like someone spilled warer in there evrrything was soaked... after 2nd time i realized it was the wipes... i use another brand in my bag and these at home. Also u either need to pat dry or wait to air dry when using these wipes whwn changing diapers
customer_reviews.author: Kat03316

customer_reviews.title: I'm not impressed by these wipes.
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are over priced and too small individually. They are not good at cleaning my sons diaper mess. I can't get a good grip on them unless I grab at least three at once. They don't wipe my son all the way clean. There are still little specks left that won't wipe off. It just spreads it around.
customer_reviews.author: Joy B

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Flimsy Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Excellent all around product! I feel comfortable using these on my child's sensitive skin and face! The packaging gets a bit flimsy near the end of the wipe package; the lid won't stay closed. It can be hard to grab one wipe at a time, sometimes 5 come out (but that is a criticism of most wipes). If you are changing a poopy diaper, I recommend taking a few of these out of the package beforehand, so you aren't struggling to get them out when you most need them! On the whole, these are the only wipes I will ever use!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes - Use with wipe containers
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are great. The ingredients are fantastic and they do a good job cleaning baby. I can use them to clean baby's neck rolls after spit up too :). I enjoy not having to worry about nasty ingredients. Even the other "natural" brands have a whole paragraph of ingredients which just isn't necessary. I bought a 3 pack of reusable wipe containers which work great - one for the diaper bag, one for the living room, and one for the bedroom. Highly recommend these wipes!
customer_reviews.author: JandC.T

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes on the market! Worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.text: These are our go to disposable baby wipes! Love that the ingredients are clean and they work really well! I’m a home daycare provider and have been able to compare these wipes to multiple other brands and prefer these by far for cleaning ability. Super durable too! Sometimes they accidentally get washed and dried with our cloth diapers and they come out mostly in one piece!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic wipes!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these wipes. They do a fantastic job keeping the little guy clean without any irritation. They are strong enough for the dirtiest jobs but gentle enough to use on his face. I would recommend these to everyone, regardless if your baby is having irritation issues or not. The only reason why I didn't give this five stars is because the wipes are somewhat difficult to get out of the package one at a time. Most times I end up pulling several out at one time and have to shove the extras back in. Not a big deal but it could definitely be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Zach S

customer_reviews.title: The most frustrating. Worst value.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried soooo many different wipes in the last 3 months. These are definitely a waste of money for how expensive they are. They stick to themselves - which makes it extremely difficult to get one out of the package, and means it usually takes more than one wipe per diaper change. The packaging is the most frustrating. Wrestling to get a wipe out makes each change stressful. Not worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Nice wipes
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy these because Huggies natural care was out due to Covid. These are better than pampers or Costco wipes which I consider to be fiberglass in a wipe. I just prefer Huggies cotton material. If these were water wipes formula and Huggies material, they would be my new favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Clean and refreshing. They do the job.
customer_reviews.text: Just received, quickly I might add. Therefore have not opened, due to wait period. When I got these the first time, I thought I shouldn’t have paid for just water. After using them, I realized how great they are. Soft, very wet, good for a clean hand ( or other places or items) wash. Good size and great to have no fragrance added.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: Only wipes that worker for us
customer_reviews.text: I like water wipes, but they are expensive and they don’t really work as well as traditional wipes for cleaning. The packaging is actually awful and often times more than one wipe will come out. We got a wipes container that helped with this problem. I gave it 4 stars since this seems to be the only wipe that didn’t irritate my baby’s skin, even when we tried other wipes that were supposed to be for sensitive skin, including Pampers Pure.
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire1823

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: New mom and I love these!!!! No rash, no chemicals, or harsh soaps. Cleans well. I use to wash her face too. The only other wipe I use is seventh generation when I run out of water wipes and I can't find them while traveling. I've had no mold issues with them. Tip buy the big box of them before you deliver. I did two months early and I'm still using them and she is 10 weeks. But it was one less thing to think about and get. Hospital wipes gave a rash and so did pampers brand. I don't buy anything pampers.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite wipes yet and just trying on my 3rd baby! Love these better than any other wipes I've tried (Pamper's regular and sensitive, Huggie's, Up & Up brand, Parent's Choice, etc). Little to no scent, great quality of wipe (not too thick, not too thin, good size, does not fall apart easily). Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jlm7183

customer_reviews.title: My favorite baby wipes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these baby wipes! I’ve tried many brands (honest/babyganics/etc.) and these are hands down the best. They are thick and made of good quality which is hard to find in a wipe. They are fragrance free and don’t leave behind any residue; this also makes me feel good when I need to wipe his hands or face here and there too. I cloth diaper so I think it is the biggest reason my little one doesn’t get rashes but these wipes are non-irritating for my baby’s skin. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: MauiMama

customer_reviews.title: Great for newborns and any baby with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: By far the best wipes for a newborn and any baby that has diaper rash. Not my favorite wipe for my toddler but easily my fave for the newborn. These aren’t as durable as other wipes and they aren’t packaged to where each subsequent wipe pops up as you pull out the one before it which makes it a little tough to pull out multiple wipes with one hand as you’re changing a diaper and are elbow deep in baby poo. But overall an excellent wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes ever
customer_reviews.text: Best wipes ever. From the beginning I wanted to use something with very few chemicalson my triplets. I tried so many organic ones but my kids skin was still suffering. I started to do some research on the best wipes for them and I finally found them. I have been using them for over a year now. My kids skin never suffered again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Pazmino

customer_reviews.title: poor ingredients​, or shall I say
customer_reviews.text: Keep your money and use water. The product does not even pull from the container properly. Poorly made, poor ingredients​, or shall I say, use your own Tap Water!
customer_reviews.author: Chugiak

customer_reviews.title: This is fake !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fake don’t buy this !!!!! You can see the reall one without the dots on the right side.
customer_reviews.author: @.G

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: These wipes work well and don't really have a fragrance which is nice but I wish the cloth material they choose to use was as natural as the wipes themselves. The sheets are made of polyester(plastic) and not biodegradable for that reason, I wish the company would go the rest of the way natural and use bamboo or organic cotton too!
customer_reviews.author: Tori C.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST HANDS DOWN
customer_reviews.text: My favorite hands down. Other wipes do not compare. So soft, so gentle, so wet. Totally worth the price in my opinion because all others are just so dry and rough. Never had diaper rash. I’ll literally never wipe my baby with anything else! I don’t recommend the soapberry ones in the green packaging tho. Only these, the original!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Layne

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these! Expensive? Yes, however we don’t go through them as quickly as other brands. They are thicker, but not too thick, so it takes less, even on big jobs! Also feel more comfortable using these on the face and wiping dropped pacifiers, etc bc they are water based and safer for the baby!
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Brittany Denny

customer_reviews.title: Annoying
customer_reviews.text: Annoying is the word for these wipes. When i pull one out i have to dig in the tiny hole to get another one. They do not pull up like they should. Great wipes if they wouldn't be so annoying with a squirming baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have time for baby and kids!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried different brand of wipes. These are by far the best. It’s a little expensive then the other brand but the quality and water base is needed for my kids. I also send my friends as gift for baby shower. Always stock up in my house whenever I see them on sale. Note** these are not disinfectant wipe. It does not kill germs.
customer_reviews.author: joicyco

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy when they sell them for double price
customer_reviews.text: Wipes are not bad ...but double the price just because of the situation we are going through (COVI-19) is immoral and it should be illegal
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Updated review for my old review.Delivered on dec 2018 and will expire on Feb 2019... for reall!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love water wipes and i always use on my baby as he has a very sensitive skin. I gave it 1 star as i received it on Dec 7th and on the box it says that it will expire on Feb 2019... for real!!!!!!! Am i supposed to finish 12 packs in 3 month. I use washcloth while we are at home so now if i don't finish the 12 packs by Feb i will lose all the money paid for it. Worst customer Experiance ever i don't expect such service from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Wafaa

customer_reviews.title: Best wipe hands down!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rave about this product enough! I looooooove water wipes! Use this wipe on your face/hands. Now use any other brand of wipe on your face/hands... there is NO comparison! Water wipes don’t leave residue, they don’t burn, they don’t smell, they aren’t overly wet or dry out. Other baby wipes do, even the ones that claim to be “pure” blah blah or “sensitive” blah blah blah. Read the ingredients on a “pure” baby wipe brand... not so pure! Anyway, water wipes are the best and my kids and I love them so much
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to pull out wipes.
customer_reviews.text: The wipes are fine. My biggest complaint is that the individual wipes are not connected to each other, therefore when you pull out one wipe... you have to reach in and fish out the second one. It doesn’t automatically pop up like most other brands. Very annoying for any diaper change that require more than one wipe.... which is almost every diaper change.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Pure, Effective Cleanse
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with these wipes! I love the simple, gentle ingredients and how effectively these wipes cleanse little bottoms, hands, faces, etc. I was introduced to Water Wipes as a baby shower gift from a manager at my last job and these have been my preferred wipes since then.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 flaw
customer_reviews.text: I love how these wipes don't dry out in my wipe warmer. However, since they aren't attached to each other, they were always a hassle to pull out. Whether they were in the original package or in the warmer, trying to grab one would turn into a ball of 4. We'd run out way to quickly because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic natural wipe
customer_reviews.text: These wipes make clean up a breeze. They are very moist, feel like a washcloth, and take fewer wipes to clean up the messiest of messes (aka poopy bums). Additionally they are gentle on the skin and have an extremely limited number of ingredients. I always include a pack of these in baby shower and welcome home gifts as I want as many people to learn about this product as possible. Price point wise, these are more expensive than big box brands, however the cost is relatively equivalent considering it takes 1/2 the amount of wipes to clean up most messes.
customer_reviews.author: jncweller

customer_reviews.title: The best wipes!
customer_reviews.text: I only use these or Honest wipes because I don’t trust chemicals on my baby’s skin. They work phenomenally, absolutely no complaints. I highly recommend these to anyone and everyone, even just as hand wipes for cleaning hands when out and about even if you don’t have a baby or young child.
customer_reviews.author: Josiek

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Love these wipes, have used them for over a year, definitely agrees with my baby's sensitive skin. They don't rip as you take them out if the package so that's definitely a plus. What I hate is when you are trying to get a wipe out, the next one doesn't pop up and when you get to the end of the package with 4 or 5 left they all come out. Other than that they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake WaterWipes/no way to contact seller
customer_reviews.text: The product I got this time is different from the one I usually get (fake???) and I just bought a 12 packs box!!!: the packaging is different, they are NOT fragrance free and they are a lot more wet than the original ones. soaking wet, which makes it very inconvenient to use. Worst of all, I think my 5 months old is having a skin reaction to these wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Mourad

customer_reviews.title: No smell, perfect dampness, great for cleaning up baby!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our third bulk purchase of water wipes. These wipes are amazing because they are 99% water! We used these wipes with our newborn baby and she did not have a reaction to them. They are scent-free, unlike many other name brands which smell awful. These stay wet and do a great job wiping up all messes! We feel so good about these wipes we will even use them on our baby’s hands (she puts hands right to her mouth after because of teething) and her face too.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Gold

customer_reviews.title: These wipes are worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a hard core bargin shopper, but I promise you these wipes are worth the extra cost. I've tried cheaper wipes including the Amazon brand and they don't come close to Water Wipes. These wipes clean so easily, no scent, and are gentle on that little baby toosh, face, hands, everywhere! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Potter Party of 3

customer_reviews.title: Fake!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using water wipes for over two years now and buying them off amazon but these latest ones I got discounted during prime day literally haha to be fake. Not nearly as soft. They feel thicker and drier. Not okay since I bought three boxes!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen D.

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and not toxic
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky about the products I use, especially when I use them on my children. These wipes stay damp forever. They don't smell funny. They don't mold. They clean really well, and the wipes are gently soft. I love this product and recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and easy to get out of package
customer_reviews.text: Extremely gentle wipes. The packaging was a concern since they do not clasp shut however The wipes do not dry out if the bag is not perfectly sealed. My favorite thing about these wipes is that they are not connected or intertwined. Nothing is worse when changing a bad diaper than not being able to get another wipe quickly. When baby arrived we shopped around and used many different wipe brands and came back to these. They do cost slightly more than other wipes but it is 100% worth it
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Expecting mom to be
customer_reviews.text: This is the best baby wipe on the market so far. Am testing most care for baby on my self and I received a sample in the Amazon welcome box for baby gift registry. I am excited for diaper changes with this bulk supply of quality wipes soft moist and perfect thickness super gentle and soothing. I hope my baby will agree
customer_reviews.author: Shiaye

customer_reviews.title: Most natural wipe I could find
customer_reviews.text: Assuming we can believe what packaging says, then I really like these as my go to for the most natural baby wipe possible for baby. Purified water and a drop of citrus, I’m guessing it’s the acidity that “cleans”. I know these won’t sanitize but theee aren’t any really bad chemicals in it either. Cleans up “messes” pretty quickly. Maybe leaves bottom a little sticky after use. That’s the only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: NYTEACH

customer_reviews.title: Sent expired wipes twice!
customer_reviews.text: I was sent expired wipes twice! This is extremely unsafe for your baby as they mold!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are the best. I'm trying to avoid using too many chemicals ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. I'm trying to avoid using too many chemicals especially around his wee and bum so it's nice to have something natural. I can also use these to wipe his hands knowing he's going to stick it right in his mouth afterwards. I'd recommend avoiding wiping a baby's face with these due to the grapefruit; It can be incredibly drying and irritating.
customer_reviews.author: PKiM

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT WATER WIPES AT ALL!!!
customer_reviews.text: The samples sent in the amazon baby registry welcome box prompted me to order this. App the samples were made so good to receive people into buying the regular sizes. I wasted $42 for something that is just the same as any regular wipes out there. These are not water wipes at all. You actually need to add water to the wipes to clean your baby. I would love to have my money back if I could. Don't waste your money on these please. They are just regular wipes NOT WATER WIPES AD ADVERTISED AT ALL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: A must have for every household
customer_reviews.text: Strong and soft. I use them for the puppy, to clean counter tops,clean my yoga mat, wipe spills floor, etc ..... safes a lot of kitchen towel
customer_reviews.author: Ilse

customer_reviews.title: I love the wipes, but the packaging....
customer_reviews.text: The wipes are super clean, no nastyness to harm your baby, but the packs can get on my nerves. For the price and lack of ingredients you would think the packaging would function better. Wetness gets around the sticky part and then its not sticky anymore. it would be cool if it came with a plastic container with a nice snap lid. Sometimes the wipes really wanna stick together too. I keep getting them though cuz they dont smell funny like every other fragrance free kind ive tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Hamlett

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Chemical free wipes is the way to go. This product is not a US based product (made in Ireland). why is it so hard for a US manufacture to get on board with clean and chemical free baby products? Thanks Ireland for your help! It's worth noting that my daycare provider commented on how much she likes these wipes over all other wipes and she has been in the business over 30 years and has used many wipes that parents have provided over that time frame.
customer_reviews.author: Suthrnbelle

customer_reviews.title: You won’t want to buy any other brand again.
customer_reviews.text: My baby breaks out with every other brand we have tried of baby wipes. (Even the other line that water wipes has with soapberry added) These original Water wipes are the only ones we can use on him. I’ll never buy another brand ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Lady RB

customer_reviews.title: Well they were fine as a wipe I had a lot of difficulty ...
customer_reviews.text: Originally I was a big fan of yours but after switching to regular Pampers brand wipes I'm not convinced they're worth all the hype. Well they were fine as a wipe I had a lot of difficulty pulling them from the package without getting clumps of them and wasting and after using them my son still smelled. Didn't really give him as clean as I would hope. Child has sensitive skin they are fine but otherwise I would skip it
customer_reviews.author: Shanon Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes out there
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has extremely sensitive skin - as do I, she def got it from her mama. Anywho - someone recommended these to me because she kept breaking out to every other wipe and this is day 8 using these & we are in the clear! Great for her booty, I even feel good enough about them to use on her hands or face when she eats & gets messy. I HIGHLY recommend if your baby has sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Khylee

customer_reviews.title: Thicker, softer, and more moisture
customer_reviews.text: I started using these because it’s what the NICU used when our 2nd baby was born early. They’re great for sensitive skin and using with diaper rashes. The wipes are thicker and softer than others and hold more moisture so you can wipe gently and still clean quickly. I’ve used pampers, huggies and amazon brand. Those are all good products, but I like these better because of the extra moisture and softness.
customer_reviews.author: k_eide

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My baby girl is almost 3 weeks old and these wipes do the job pretty well. They don’t irritate her sensitive skin, they have no smell whatsoever and they clean the poo and pee out efficiently. Hopefully with time they won’t start irritate my baby’s skin.
customer_reviews.author: Christelle

customer_reviews.title: They did the job- not comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: These are very wet, not very soft, and several pull out at once. They did help with the sensitivity issues my little one was having. They also do not have a pop top just the hard plastic that sticks. The price seems a bit much for wipes that are 99.8% water and a little grapefruit extract with minimalist packaging. I wasn't sure how to rate the sent... there isn't much of one. Which is what you want when buy sensitive anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have tried many different types of wipes and this product comes out on top every time. Worth the extra $$. Thick, soft, no scent. I only wish they were a little easier to get out of the package 1 at a time. They tend to clump and come out as a bunch. I will continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: smaller, thinner wipes than before!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these wipes on our son since birth 15 months ago. I have loved them up until now. The latest case arrived yesterday. The wipes are significantly smaller and thinner. I am disappointed. Now I'll have to use twice as many wipes as before. If they are going to change a product they should tell you that on the packaging! I'm going to contact the company directly tomorrow to complain. Smaller, thinner wipes for the same price is frustrating. The selling point for me to purchase them in the first place is the lack of toxic ingredients. I love that they are water and a tiny bit of fruit extract. Nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again unless it's all that is available.
customer_reviews.text: Unscented, soft, very wet. It's like wiping with a soaked, silk paper towel. I like that it doesnt leave bits behind like the huggies wipes but I use more of these because they are not very thick and they stick together. In the middle of changing a diaper, it is hard to pull out just 1 from the pack, it adds up.
customer_reviews.author: Nathen

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the Water Wipes bough in a store
customer_reviews.text: The description and the actual product are not the same. This product DOES contain chemicals. I feel that they are falsely advertised. My daughter had a horrible reaction from these wipes. Normally Water Wipes are fine on her sensitive skin, but these are not the same as the Water Wipes I buy in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: WaterWipes Unscented Baby Wipes, Sensitive and Newborn Skin, 12 Packs (720 Wipes)
product_meta.description: Size:720 CountA baby’s skin is much more delicate than your own. So it should be cleaned with only the gentlest and purest elements possible. WaterWipes are the only wipes made with just water, specially purified and softened, and a tiny drop of grapefruit seed extract. WaterWipes have been carefully designed to be gentle on babies’ sensitive skin. They are the only wipes that contain 99.9% water and a drop of grapefruit seed extract – a natural skin conditioner. Because they are hypoallergenic, WaterWipes don’t irritate the skin and are safe for use on sensitive skin. The National Eczema Association has awarded the Seal of Acceptance to WaterWipes. The story behind WaterWipes When our first daughter was born, she suffered with sensitive skin and developed bad diaper rash. I wanted to find out why, so I took a look at the ingredients in the baby wipes we were using. I was shocked to learn just how many chemicals were in them – and questioned should we be putting them on her delicate skin I thought there had to be a better way so I set about creating a purer and safe alternative. Many years later and after a lot of hard work, testing, and scientific research, the perfect baby wipes, WaterWipes were born. Pure, gentle and safe for the most delicate skin yet as convenient as a regular baby wipe. Every day, in every corner of the world, new moms and dads are discovering the benefits of our gentle and safe wipes for their baby’s skin, I hope you like them too. Ingredients are Water (Aqua) 99.9%, Citrus Grandis (grapefruit) seed extract and contains traces of Benzalkonium Chloride
feature_bullets: Simply two ingredients: Our fragrance-free baby wipes contain 99.9% water with just a drop of fruit extract
Ideal for sensitive skin: Waterwipes baby wipes are gentle enough for premature, infant, and newborn skin
Simple & clean: Vegan society accredited baby wipes are hypoallergenic and contain no parabens or sulphates to irritate sensitive skin
Trusted: Waterwipes is awarded the national Eczema association of america seal of acceptance
Perfect for: Diaper changing, during weaning and teething, for cleaning baby's hands and face, and even adult sensitive skin care

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
